price: Abraham kaa sε: “Daabi, Mo Wura Nyankopͻn no, Ɔne ͻsoro ne asaase Wura a Ɔbͻͻ (soro ne asaase) no, na medeε meka wͻn a wͻdi woi ho adanseε no ho.
arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla bal rabbukum rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alladhī faṭarahunna wa-anā ʿalā dhālikum mina al-shāhidīna
